quote: Hold on. Don't go! Let's argue again. I'll bribe you with a canelé. I'll call you to kill time. I don't mind being Friend A. Please don't go. Please don't go. Please don't go...please don't leave me behind.
You never appreciate the irreplaceable things in life until they're gone. Like summer vacation... or brothers.
Because my time is limited, I don't have any time to waste hesitating. That is why I can walk straight ahead. That is why I never stop.
By depending on others and letting them depend on you, people can exceed what they can do as individuals.
The real fun is in constantly pushing beyond your limits. So if you're thinking of everything as a game, you won't be able to fully experience it.
Love is hating someone but you still want to be with them.
Accident or amnesia, you can't rewind your life and start again. If you struggle, you'll just hurt yourself, and the people around you.
Even if he hates me, being able to die with the knowledge that the one I love will never forget me… there is no greater happiness a woman could desire.
The day before yesterday, I saw a rabbit. Yesterday, it was a deer. And today, It’s you.
I have someone I like. I never had the confidence and I’ve doubted my feelings countless of times. But, when she stays by my side and smiles with me, I feel like I can do anything.
Skipping school for one day might not be a problem, but if you skip for three days in a row, it'd be really hard to convince yourself to go back.
I can only say that the human curiosity is something completely irrational.
Fake people have an image to maintain. Real people just don't care.
anime: Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machigatteiru

quote: It's alright to feel sad. When you're sad, you should experience that sorrow fully. It's not too late to move on after that.
Even if I know you'll reject me, even if I'm afraid you won't accept me, even if I know it will really hurt if you dump me - I still have to tell you how I feel!
anime: Ore no Imouto ga Konnani Kawaii Wake ga Nai

quote: Greed may not be good, but it’s not so bad either. You humans think greed is just for money or power, but everyone wants something they can’t have.
Don't believe in the you that believes in me and don't believe in the me that believes in you. Believe in the you that believes in yourself!
I am who I am now because of everything that's happened. If I try to deny my past, I'm denying the person I've become. I don't want to do that.
In our society, letting others find out that you're a nice person is a very risky move. It's extremely likely that someone would take advantage of that.
Don't be distracted by the what-if's, should-have's, and if-only's. The one thing you choose for yourself - that is the truth of your universe.
Mankind’s greatest fear is Mankind itself.
Everyone dies eventually, whether they have power or not. That's why you need to think about what you'll accomplish while you're alive.
I wasn’t scared that I’d be rejected, I was scared that if I said how I felt, all of our relationships would change.
